speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mike from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with Sarah?

speaker: Customer
text: No, this is not Sarah. You might have the wrong number.

speaker: Agent
text: I apologize for that. I'm reaching out about a past due account with ABC Credit.

speaker: Customer
text: I really don't know anyone named Sarah, and I definitely don't have any accounts with ABC Credit.

speaker: Agent
text: That’s understandable. Let me double-check the number I have on file.

speaker: Customer
text: I hope you find the right person soon.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for your patience, and I'm sorry for the inconvenience.
